title: Hebrew monospaced font?
content:
hi,   
does anybody know of a hebrew monospaced font? or think it is even possible to design hebrew monospaced font?
author: anonymous

comments.content:
I know of one for sure, but I will have to look it   
up later. Stay tunned. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020191049im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
